attributes.title: JUGGLING BABIES IN A HAUNTED HOUSE • Rescuties! Horror VR
attributes.caption: DO I HAVE TO CATCH 'EM?
attributes.description: Aleks and James set up a VR adventure for their visitors, Brett and Dex. While Dex gets to live his lifelong dream of catching and throwing babies around the city, Brett does not get the same luxury.He must traverse the spooky house with no moral support from Dex and find out who is leaving all these barely legible notes around.Rescuties! VR and Emily wants to play VR. Juggling babies and hiding like babies.
attributes.display_title: JUGGLING BABIES IN A HAUNTED HOUSE • Rescuties! Horror VR

attributes.title: ASSISTANTS AND DOG KIDNEYS • Surgeon Simulator VR Gameplay
attributes.caption: SURGERY HAS NEVER BEEN EASIER
attributes.description: The boys want to become surgeons, and who can blame them? Surgery looks fine, and a little easy don't you think? You just cut open a slither of meat there, and stuff some other meat right in here, you see? Well, hope you enjoy this episode of surgery, thanks.
attributes.display_title: ASSISTANTS AND DOG KIDNEYS • Surgeon Simulator VR Gameplay

attributes.title: LASER BEAM INCISION • Surgeon Simulator VR Gameplay
attributes.caption: YOU GOTTA GET IN THERE!
attributes.description: This time it's Aleks' turn to play doctor. With his steady hands and quick thinking, there is absolutely no way this surgery can go wrong. Absolutely no way.
attributes.display_title: LASER BEAM INCISION • Surgeon Simulator VR Gameplay

attributes.title: HEADBUTTING JOSHUA BELL • PlayStation VR Gameplay
attributes.caption: WOW, WHAT AN ASSORTMENT OF GAMES
attributes.description: Today they decided to try a few unfamiliar PS4 VR games, and to be honest the games didn't turn out that great. Enjoy the awkward experience of VR.
attributes.display_title: HEADBUTTING JOSHUA BELL • PlayStation VR Gameplay

attributes.title: WARP SPEED • Star Trek: Bridge Crew Virtual Reality Gameplay
attributes.caption: ​LIVE LONG AND PROSPER
attributes.description: With this new addition into the Star Trek canon, the guys take on the role of being the crew of the Enterprise. In a game all about teamwork, do they stand a chance?
attributes.display_title: WARP SPEED • Star Trek: Bridge Crew Virtual Reality Gameplay

attributes.title: TANGO DOWN • Onward 4 Player Virtual Reality Gameplay
attributes.caption: HOW DO I RELOAD?
attributes.description: simulates realistic warfare in a virtual reality world. It perfectly captures the grit of shooting, reloading, aiming and ducking with no technical glitches whatsoever.
attributes.display_title: TANGO DOWN • Onward 4 Player Virtual Reality Gameplay

attributes.title: DONALD TRUMP EARTHQUAKE • Virtual Reality Gameplay
attributes.caption: DO YOU KNOW HOW TO SURVIVE A DISASTER?
attributes.description: We have two things to teach everyone today: earthquake safety and what it's like to be president. See how the boys fair during a massive earthquake and completing President Donald Trump's tasks before a major speech.
attributes.display_title: DONALD TRUMP EARTHQUAKE • Virtual Reality Gameplay

attributes.title: RIPPING GLADIATORS TO PIECES • Virtual Reality Gameplay
attributes.caption: "ARE YOU NOT ENTERTAINED!?"
attributes.description: If you thurst for blood and gore, then GORN is the game for you. This is what it's really like to be a gladiator.
attributes.display_title: RIPPING GLADIATORS TO PIECES • Virtual Reality Gameplay
